text: This obsoletes IRM 4.15.5, Jeopardy/Termination Assessments, Post-Assessment Procedures.

IRM Reference Description of Change • 4.15.5.1 This IRM is obsolete. • 4.15.5.2 Abatement procedures moved to 4.15.2.5.5. • Procedures may also be found in IRM 4.8.8.7.1.4, Abating Jeopardy/Termination Assessments. • 4.15.5.3 Possession of Cash procedures moved to IRM 4.15.2.5.6. • Procedures may also be found in IRM 4.8.8.7.1.3.3, Possessor of Cash Notice of Deﬁciency. • 4.15.5.4 Termination Follow-Up moved to IRM 4.15.2.5.2. • 4.15.5.4.1 Control of Assessment Files moved to IRM 4.15.2.2.4. • 4.15.5.4.2 Filing Requirements by the Taxpayer moved to IRM 4.15.2.5.2.1. • 4.15.5.4.3 Examination of Full-Year Return moved to IRM 4.15.2.5.2.2. • 4.15.5.5 Notice of Deﬁciency moved to IRM 4.15.2.5.1. • Procedures may also be found in IRM 4.8.8.7.1.3, Preparing Notices of Deﬁciency.
IRM 4.15.5, Jeopardy/Termination Assessments, Post-Assessment Procedures dated October 15, 2014 obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.
